name: River Raid On Mars
overview: River Raid On Mars is a new sequel for the classic River Raid. After the successful "River Raid Cold Winter", this time the challenge moves to a new planet, finding new enemies and scenarios. After the human colonization of Mars, the planet was suddenly attacked by an unknown alien force. Your target is to pilot a new generation of spaceships and cut the paths being used by enemy aliens, as well as cleaning as much as possible each valley, called vallis in Mars. You can use nearby Tesla Coils to recharge your battery, and remember to move fast, the more you advance the more difficult it becomes on the martian land.
